productInformation.value: #30,346 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining) #10 in Rotisseries & Roasters

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hamilton Beach 28 LB Turkey Roaster Oven Double your oven space. Roast, bake, cook and serve with this stainless steel roaster oven. With a 22-quart capacity and the convenience of a conventional oven, it’s the perfect answer for extra oven space when cooking holiday dinners and large meals. Adjustable temperature control from 150º to 450ºF lets you do everything from keep a side dish warm to roast a large turkey. The removable rack has handles to easily lift big items after cooking. Or take the roaster oven right to the table for serving. Either way, cleanup is easy - the removable pan, lid and rack can be washed in hot, soapy water. Key Features: Fits up to a 28 lb turkey - perfect for the holidays 22 quart capacity Removable pan - Enamel-on-steel interior pan removes for easy cleanup Easily remove large items from oven after cooking with lift-out rack

Roast Roast beef, turkey, chicken and ham to perfect tenderness in about 3 ½ hours. The lift-out rack makes the oven to platter transition easy. Bake Bake your favorite cakes, pies, breads or casseroles just how you would in a conventional oven. This roaster oven fits one 9” by 13” baking pan, or two 9” by 5” loaf pans, or one tube/Bundt pan. Cook Cook up stews, soups and side dishes in the enamel-on-steel removable pan. Pre-cooked food can be warmed from refrigerated temperature to serving temperature in about two hours. Serve With an attractive design, the roaster is perfect on the buffet for easy serving. Keep rolls, biscuits, or even pancakes warm for up to one hour. Just preheat the roaster oven to 250ºF and fill two small ovenproof containers 2/3 full with water and place in opposite corners of the insert pan. Stack up the food and cover.
Dome Lid Adds Height Keep the heat inside, even on a 28 lb. turkey, with the domed lid.
Easy Cleanup With Removable Pan The enamel-on-steel interior removes for easy cleanup.

Everyday Good Thinking. Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helpful kitchen addition
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful additional oven when needed. It’s great for large gatherings, serving hot food, keeping food warm. It’s large enough for a large turkey, roasts, etc. I used it for serving fajitas, keeping tamales warmed in foil, baking dressing. Lots of uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for first time turkey cooks and to save the oven for other dishes!
reviews.reviewText: This was my first year making the turkey and overall it went great using this roaster. With a larger turkey it can take some finagling (will do better tying of the legs next time) to prevent parts from touching the side as it cooks and opens up. Worked great right on the counter top, definitely cooks turkey faster than expected so shave maybe 20-30% of the time you would typically cook. I was worried it wouldn't create a nice crispy skin but it does! Great purchase overall, worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Turkey Roaster
reviews.reviewText: Probably the best turkey I've ever made. Moist, looked beautiful and this roaster freed up the oven for casseroles. I've tried many ways to cook large turkeys and this is by far the best. Rubbed it with EVO and poultry seasoning, good amount of pepper and then, for color, smoked paprika. Came out perfect.Highly recommend. Only downside is no on light but that's only a personal preference. Good, basic roaster oven like our mom and grandma used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Christmas Tur-duc-en
reviews.reviewText: I received this roaster for Christmas. Opened it Christmas morning, washed it, and cooked the Christmas bird in it! We (D-I-L & I) were really glad I got it. We had several casseroles and desserts that we cooked in the regular oven. While this roaster was cooking up our 15 lb turducen with stuffing. When I read the instructions, I found out that you can also cook multiple items at a time in it. The instructions on how to do this seem easy and at some future time I will try it. This roaster worked as an extra "oven" and I would purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great addition to our kitchen appliances. This thing is big enough for a 24# turkey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Oven - Great For Turkeys
reviews.reviewText: Con: Wish it had a temp light that goes off when internal temp reaches the set temp.Pro: I would give this oven 5 stars except for the light. Very portable, keep the original box. Retains heat very well. I only use it twice or three times a year for turkeys. I have used the oven outside in 20 degree weather. Cooks evenly. This is my second type of oven. Last one lasted 15 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooks turkey, chicken and beef quick!!
reviews.reviewText: This is such a great cooker! We bought it for Thanksgiving this year and was able to cook a 19lbs turkey in just a bit over 2 hours!! Just made a nice bottom round of beef medium rare in about 1.5 hours!! Easy to cleanup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds the largest turkey or roast you have
reviews.reviewText: This is a quality small appliance. Well made and cooks perfectly.
